src.fieldDescription: Please enter the URL of the site
src.name: ./src

width.fieldDescription: Enter the width of the iframe. Include 'px' or '%' at the end or it will default to pixels. Default is 100%
width.name: ./width

height.fieldDescription: Enter the height of the iframe. Include 'px' or '%' at the end or it will default to pixels. Default is 500px
height.name: ./height

frame-border.fieldDescription: Check to give the frame a border
frame-border.name: ./frame-border

outer-css.fieldDescription: Enter inline CSS for the iframe container, separated by semi-colons. Note: width, height, overflow, and position are handled automatically
outer-css.name: ./outer-css

inner-css.fieldDescription: Enter inline CSS for the iframe content, separated by semi-colons, possibly including width, height, top, and left
inner-css.name: ./inner-css

outer-class.fieldDescription: Insert CSS classes for the iframe container, separated by spaces
outer-class.name: ./outer-class

inner-class.fieldDescription: Insert CSS classes for the iframe content, separated by spaces
inner-class.name: ./inner-class
